pr_title: CB-8635 Add new values for UI to checkRight enum

timeline.bodyText: Can you please rename it to SDX_UPGRADE to match the others?
timeline.author: agov

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/core-api/src/main/java/com/sequenceiq/cloudbreak/api/endpoint/v4/util/base/RightV4.java b/core-api/src/main/java/com/sequenceiq/cloudbreak/api/endpoint/v4/util/base/RightV4.java
index bb6307dac5..b6bd923853 100644
--- a/core-api/src/main/java/com/sequenceiq/cloudbreak/api/endpoint/v4/util/base/RightV4.java
+++ b/core-api/src/main/java/com/sequenceiq/cloudbreak/api/endpoint/v4/util/base/RightV4.java

@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ public enum RightV4 {
     DH_START(AuthorizationResourceAction.START_DATAHUB),
     DH_STOP(AuthorizationResourceAction.STOP_DATAHUB),
     DH_DELETE(AuthorizationResourceAction.DELETE_DATAHUB),
-    DL_UPGRADE(AuthorizationResourceAction.UPGRADE_DATALAKE),
+    SDX_UPGRADE(AuthorizationResourceAction.UPGRADE_DATALAKE),
     CHANGE_CRED(AuthorizationResourceAction.CHANGE_CREDENTIAL),
     // legacy
     DISTROX_READ(AuthorizationResourceAction.DATAHUB_READ),
